## Data Engineering Course

Coursework for the IBM Data Engineering Professional Certificate

* Introduction to Data Engineering

  - Core Functionality, Programming Control Statements, Numpy and Pandas
* ["Python-Project-for-Data-Engineering/index.html"](Python Project for Data Engineering)
  - Extract Transform and Load (ETL) data using an IDE

* Introduction to Relational Databases (RDBMS)
* Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python

* ["Getting-started-with-Data-warehousing-and-BI-Analytics/index.html"](Getting Started with Data Warehousing and BI Analytics)
* Introduction to NoSQL Databases
* Introduction to Big Data with Spark and Hadoop
* Data Engineering Capstone Project
